com.hula.web.filter

Class HulaWebFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hula.web.filter.HulaWebFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class HulaWebFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    Filter responsible for recognising Hula requests, as well as channel switching between secure/non-secure URLs

      • getAlternativeChannelURL

        protected java.lang.String getAlternativeChannelURL(Script script,
                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Check if we need to switch channel, and return the redirection URL.
        Parameters:
        script - The script to be executed
        request - The incoming request
